text:
RELIGION

Mahabharatham: Rama Dikshithar, Sri Krishna Gana Sabha, T. Nagar, 6.30 p.m.

Gita: R. Aravindan, Andhra Mahila Sabha, Luz Church Rd., Mylapore, 7.30 a.m.; Satyavratanand Saraswati, Samskrita Bharati, 5, 7{+t}{+h}St., Radhakrishnan Salai, Mylapore, 8.30 a.m.; Ramana Swaroopananda, R-Block, 47/15, 15{+t}{+h}St., Anna Nagar, 6.45 p.m.

Philosophical Significance of Sri Ramakrishna Aratrikam: Paramasukhananda, Ramakrishna Math, Mylapore, 5.30 p.m.

Thiruppavai Vilakkamum Aanmeegathil Nagaichuvaiyum: S. Raghuv eeran, Sr. Mark’s HSS., Radha Nagar Main Rd., Chromepet, 5.15 p.m.

Yoga Vaasishtam: T.G. Narayanaswamy, 273-B, 2{+n}{+d}Main Rd., Natesa Nagar, Virugambakkam, 6 p.m.

Aanmeega Santheega Vilakkangal: Sri Arthanareeswarar Temple, Nanganallur, 7 p.m.

CULTURE

Organising Committee: Launch of publication ‘Sarandainthorai Rakshikkum Sri Ramar Thalangal’, Tamil Nadu Senaithalaivar Mahajana Sangam, 150, Habibullah Rd., T. Nagar, 6.30 p.m.

GENERAL

Japanese Chamber of Commerce and Industry, Chennai: Safety awareness promotion campaign, Marina Beach, 4.30 p.m.

IIT Kharagpur Alumni Association – Chennai Chapter: Panel Discussion on Technology and Cinema; ICSR Auditorium, IIT-M, 10 a.m.

Loka Kshema Seva Samiti: Programme to honour parents who have enrolled their children in a veda pathasala, Kuchalambal Kalyana Mahal, Chetpet, 9 a.m.
title: Chennai today
